key_title: Key to the genera of Violaceae

breadcrumbs.key_title: Key to the main groups of plants in Victoria
Key to the families of Dicotyledons

source.author: Entwisle, T.J.
source.title: Violaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae
source.citation: From: Entwisle, T.J. (1996). Violaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Flowers almost radially symmetric, lower petal resembling others, not markedly spurred or enlarged; fruit a berry or drupe
Flowers bilaterally symmetric, lower petal pouched, spurred and/or enlarged, markedly differing from others; fruit a capsule
Herbs or shrubs, stems erect or rarely climbing; leaves sessile or nearly so; sepals without appendages
Herbs with very short stems, often stoloniferous; leaves with distinct, usually long, petiole; sepals with basal appendages
